Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Showman \Show"man\, n.; pl. {Showmen}. 1. One who exhibits a show; a proprietor of a show. [1913 Webster]
2. a producer of an entertainment.
3. One who has a knack for dramatic or entertaining presentation; an entertainer. [1913 Webster]
showman n : a sponsor who books and stages public entertainments [syn: {promoter}, {impresario}]
